languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт пристыженно склоняет голову.{/n} "В твоих словах истина, с которой невозможно спорить. Мне следовало осознать раньше, что ты досто{mf|ин|йна} лучшего отношения, чем я тебе даровала. Досто{mf|ен|йна}... доверия. Прости мою былую надменность, {name}".

{n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт пристыженно склоняет голову.{/n} "В твоих словах истина, с которой невозможно спорить. Мне следовало осознать раньше, что ты досто{mf|ин|йна} лучшего отношения, чем я тебе даровала. Досто{mf|ен|йна}... доверия. Прости мою былую надменность, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is an indisputable truth in your words. I should have realized sooner that you deserve to be treated better than I did. Deserve... to be trusted. Forgive me my insolence, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is an indisputable truth in your words. I should have realized sooner that you deserve to be treated better than I did. Deserve... to be trusted. Forgive me my insolence, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特惭愧地低下了头。{/n}“你说得一点都没错。我应该早一些意识到，你对我的付出远远超过我对你的付出。你是个……值得信任的人，请原谅我的傲慢，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特惭愧地低下了头。{/n}“你说得一点都没错。我应该早一些意识到，你对我的付出远远超过我对你的付出。你是个……值得信任的人，请原谅我的傲慢，{name}。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baja la cabeza avergonzada.{/n} «Tus palabras encierran una verdad indiscutible. Debería haberme dado cuenta antes de que mereces más de lo que yo te ofrecí. Mereces... mi confianza. Te ruego que disculpes mi arrogancia, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baja la cabeza avergonzada.{/n} «Tus palabras encierran una verdad indiscutible. Debería haberme dado cuenta antes de que mereces más de lo que yo te ofrecí. Mereces... mi confianza. Te ruego que disculpes mi arrogancia, {name}».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baisse la tête, honteuse.{/n} « Vos paroles recèlent une part de vérité. J'aurais dû réaliser plus tôt que vous méritiez plus que ce que je vous ai offert. Vous êtes digne... de ma confiance. Pardonnez mon arrogance, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baisse la tête, honteuse.{/n} « Vos paroles recèlent une part de vérité. J'aurais dû réaliser plus tôt que vous méritiez plus que ce que je vous ai offert. Vous êtes digne... de ma confiance. Pardonnez mon arrogance, {name}. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet senkt beschämt den Kopf.{/n} "Die Wahrheit in Euren Worten ist unbestreitbar. Ich hätte früher erkennen sollen, dass Ihr mehr verdient hattet, als ich Euch angeboten habe. Ihr verdient ... mein Vertrauen. Verzeiht meine Arroganz, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet senkt beschämt den Kopf.{/n} "Die Wahrheit in Euren Worten ist unbestreitbar. Ich hätte früher erkennen sollen, dass Ihr mehr verdient hattet, als ich Euch angeboten habe. Ihr verdient ... mein Vertrauen. Verzeiht meine Arroganz, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは恥ずかしそうに頭を下げる。{/n}「お前の言葉には紛れもない真実がある。もっと早く気づくべきだった…お前には、我が差し出した以上の価値があると。お前は信頼に値する存在だ。我の傲慢さを許してほしい、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは恥ずかしそうに頭を下げる。{/n}「お前の言葉には紛れもない真実がある。もっと早く気づくべきだった…お前には、我が差し出した以上の価値があると。お前は信頼に値する存在だ。我の傲慢さを許してほしい、{name}」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, utançla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerinin doğruluğu su götürmez. Sana sunduklarımdan daha fazlasına layık olduğunu çok önceden anlamam gerekirdi. Güvenime layıksın. Küstahlığımı affet {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her head in shame.{/n} "There is indisputable truth to your words. I should have realised sooner that you were worthy of more than what I offered you. You are worthy... of my trust. Forgive me my arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, utançla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerinin doğruluğu su götürmez. Sana sunduklarımdan daha fazlasına layık olduğunu erkenden anlamam gerekirdi. Güvenime layıksın. Küstahlığımı affet {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
